/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy of greenery and architecture that stretches into the distance. A few cars and buses are visible, hinting at the city's vibrant transportation system. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are muted, adding a sense of tranquility amidst the urban hustle and bustle.
